member.name: M:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: T:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Controllers.ProductController
member.summary:
ProductController:
Controller for the Product collection. Contains functionality for all RESTful API calls such as: Get, Put, Post, and Delete.

member.name: M:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Controllers.ProductController.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary:
GetProductById:
Overload of the Get method. Fetches a specific Product from the database and returns it to the caller of this API method. Matches based off of the passed Product Id.
member.returns: The first Product returned that matches the id argument

member.name: T:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Controllers.StoreController
member.summary:
StoreController:
Controller for the "Store" API endpoint. Manages the data transfer with the database and the callers of this API.

member.name: M:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Controllers.StoreController.Get(System.String)
member.summary:
GetAllProducts:
Overload of the Get request method. Fetches all Products from the database and returns them to the caller of this API method. Matches based off of the passed storeName argument.
member.param: The Name of the Store to search
member.returns: a List of Products from that Store

member.name: M:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Controllers.StoreController.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary:
GetStoreById:
Overload for the Get request method. Returns a Store that matches the id argument.
member.param: The id to match to a Store
member.returns: A Store with a matching Id property value

member.name: T:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Controllers.UserController
member.summary:
UserController:
Controller for the User collection. Contains functionality for all RESTful API calls such as: Get, Put, Post, and Delete.

member.name: M:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Controllers.UserController.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary:
GetUserById:
Overload of the Get request method. Fetches a single user from the database and returns it to the caller of this API method. Matches based off of the passed userId argument.
member.param: The Id of the requested User
member.returns: a User with a matching Id

member.name: M:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Controllers.UserController.Get(System.String)
member.summary:
GetUserByEmail:
Overload of the Get request method. Fetches a single User from the database and returns it to the caller of this API method. Finds the user by their email address.
member.returns: a User with the matching EmailAddress

member.name: M:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Controllers.UserController.Post(TopShelfCustomer.Api.Models.User)
member.summary:
Post:
Takes a User object as an argument and adds it to the List of users. Adds append functionality to the API.

member.name: M:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Controllers.UserController.Put(System.Int32,TopShelfCustomer.Api.Models.User)
member.summary:
Put:
Takes a User object as an argument and updates an entry if it exists. If not, it appends to the list of Users.
member.param: The Id value of the User object

member.name: M:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Controllers.UserController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary:
Delete:
Deletes the User entry that matches the passed id. Matches based off of the Id property on the User.

member.name: T:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Models.Product
member.summary:
Product:
Model class for an item that can be purchased from a store. This class will be stored in the database.

member.summary: Id: The unique identifier for this product.

member.name: P:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Models.Product.Name
member.summary: Name: The name of this product.

member.name: P:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Models.Product.Price
member.summary: Price: The cost of this product.

member.name: T:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Models.Store
member.summary:
Store:
Model class for a grocery store. Held in the database with properties to identify the name, location, and list of products.

member.name: P:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Models.Store.Id
member.summary: Id: the unique identifier for this Store.

member.name: P:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Models.Store.Name
member.summary: Name: the name of this Store.

member.name: P:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Models.Store.Address
member.summary: Address: the physical address of this Store.

member.name: P:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Models.Store.ImageURL
member.summary: ImageURL: the web URL for this Store's logo image.

member.name: T:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Models.User
member.summary:
User:
API Model for a user entry in the database. All API requests to the /api/User endpoint will return this as a JSON string object.

member.name: P:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Models.User.Id
member.summary: Id: The unique id number for the User.

member.name: P:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Models.User.FullName
member.summary: FullName: The first and last name of the User.

member.name: P:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Models.User.EmailAddress
member.summary: EmailAddress: The email address string for the User.

member.name: P:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Models.User.PhoneNumber
member.summary: PhoneNumber: The string representation of the User's phone number.

member.name: P:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Models.User.StreetAddress
member.summary: StreetAddress: The physical address of the User.

member.name: P:TopShelfCustomer.Api.Models.User.StoreName
member.summary: StoreName: The shortened name of the User's home store.
